rules_text:
When Tia enters, create a 1/1 white Horse creature token.
Whenever a Beast, Bird, Dinosaur, Horse, or Lizard creature you control attacks, create a Leading Role token attached to that creature. Untap it. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.)[/i]
